title: The Imitation Game
storyline: During World War II, the English mathematical genius Alan Turing tries to crack the German Enigma code with help from fellow mathematicians.

title: Inception
storyline: A thief, who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology, is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

title: The Pursuit of Happyness
storyline: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional career.
